name.namePart: Citizens' Advisory Committees on Recreation and Natural Beauty and Environmental Quality

mods.note: Includes: The citizens' advisory committee on environmental quality and the citizens' advisory committee on recreation and natural beauty in perspective, August 1976; A new look at recyclling: report on a conference, May 11, 1976; Report to the presidentand the council on environmental quality, December 1975; Report to the president and to the council on environmental quality, December 1974; From rails to trails, August 1975; Energy in solid waste: a citizen guide to saving, December 1975
mods.abstract: Bound reports, embossed on cover 'Laurance S. Rockefeller'
